doc.field: Series II: Subject Files, contains material pertaining to Tillman's work and research as a critic and writer, and is also indicative of her participation in a larger artistic community. These include original creative work, drafts, and research produced by Tillman and other artists, as well as announcements of performances and events, and other related articles.

The material is arranged alphabetically by artist(s), venue/organizer or subject where possible. Events/works with numerous participating artists are listed by title. This series is separated into three subseries: A: Artists B: Subjects C: Photographic Materials and Miscellaneous
